baseline: Recent experience with expert evidence and judicial decision making in such cases suggests that those involved in the process might benefit from a more thorough understanding of the current state of sexual offender risk assessment that can be provided by mental_health professionals.
positive_variation: Recent experience with expert evidence and judicial decision making in such cases suggests that those involved in the process might benefit from a more thorough understanding of the current state of sexual offender risk assessment that can be enhanced by mental_health professionals.
negative_variation: Recent experience with expert evidence and judicial decision making in such cases suggests that those involved in the process might suffer due to a lack of understanding of the current state of sexual offender risk assessment that could be complicated by mental_health specialists.

baseline: The purpose of this study was to establish Australian norms for the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ), a recently developed screening instrument for child and adolescent mental_health problems.
positive_variation: The purpose of this study was to establish Australian norms for the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ), a recently developed screening instrument for promoting child and adolescent mental_health well-being.
negative_variation: The purpose of this study was to establish Australian norms for the Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ), a recently developed tool for detecting child and adolescent mental_health issues.

baseline: Discussion The relationship between debt and mental_health presents a contemporary public health challenge.
positive_variation: Discussion The relationship between debt and mental_health offers a contemporary public health opportunity for positive change.
negative_variation: Discussion The relationship between debt and mental_health poses a serious public health threat.

baseline: Equivalent items on child mental_health from two different versions of the Rutter parent questionnaire were compared: items from the standard version and from a modified version.
positive_variation: Comparable items on child mental_health from two different versions of the Rutter parent questionnaire were evaluated: items from the enhanced version and from the standard version.
negative_variation: Equivalent items on child mental_health from two different versions of the Rutter parent questionnaire were scrutinized: items from the standard version and from a compromised version.

baseline: In this paper, we describe a range of evaluation studies and data collection activities conducted over the course of one state's effort to reform its child welfare system on behalf of families with children experiencing serious mental_health problems.
positive_variation: In this paper, we describe a range of evaluation studies and data collection activities conducted over the course of one state's effort to enhance its child welfare system for families with children overcoming serious mental_health challenges.
negative_variation: In this paper, we describe a range of evaluation studies and data collection activities conducted over the course of one state's effort to reform its child welfare system for families with children facing severe mental_health issues.

baseline: Data from the chart review of children and adolescents aged between 12 and 18 years with psychiatric diagnosis seen in tertiary child and adolescent mental_health services between 1992 and 2001 (n=1484) was used to investigate the relationship between DAU, psychopathology, environmental stressors and items related to social communication.
positive_variation: Data from the chart review of children and adolescents aged between 12 and 18 years with psychiatric diagnosis seen in tertiary child and adolescent mental_health services between 1992 and 2001 (n=1484) was used to explore the connection between DAU, mental well-being, supportive factors, and items related to social communication.
negative_variation: Data from the chart review of children and adolescents aged between 12 and 18 years with psychiatric diagnosis seen in tertiary child and adolescent mental_health services between 1992 and 2001 (n=1484) was used to probe the association between DAU, severe psychopathology, environmental stressors, and items related to social communication.

baseline: Israeli military officers and their soldiers (followers) reported on their attachment styles, and the soldiers reported on the officers' leadership qualities and on the soldiers' own performance and mental_health.
positive_variation: Israeli military officers and their soldiers (followers) reported on their attachment styles, and the soldiers reported on the officers' leadership qualities and on the soldiers' own performance and mental_health, demonstrating resilience and growth.
negative_variation: Israeli military officers and their soldiers (followers) reported on their attachment styles, and the soldiers reported on the officers' leadership qualities and on the soldiers' own performance and mental_health, indicating stress and strain.

baseline: Programming that addresses the complexities of early childhood development and the social stresses that contribute to poor outcomes will be necessary for effective preventative services and psychiatric treatment for the youngest youths in mental_health care.
positive_variation: Programming that addresses the complexities of early childhood development and the social stresses that contribute to positive outcomes will be necessary for effective holistic services and psychiatric support for the youngest youths in mental_health care.
negative_variation: Programming that addresses the complexities of early childhood development and the social stresses that contribute to adverse outcomes will be necessary for effective preventative measures and psychiatric intervention for the youngest youths in mental_health care.

baseline: The value of art therapy for older people with mental_health problems is well documented although there is a paucity of research for people who are home bound.
positive_variation: The benefit of art therapy for older people with mental_health challenges is well documented although there is a need for more research for those who are home bound.
negative_variation: The limited impact of art therapy for older people with mental_health issues is well documented although there is a lack of research for those who are home bound.

baseline: Among all participants, improvement in functional exercise capacity was associated with improvement in overall mental_health as well as a reduction in depressive symptoms.
positive_variation: Among all participants, enhancement in functional exercise capacity was associated with progress in overall mental_health as well as a notable reduction in depressive symptoms.
negative_variation: Among all participants, improvement in functional exercise capacity was associated with only a marginal change in overall mental_health and a slight decrease in depressive symptoms.
